item.title: Oak View Group CEO Leiweke charged with bid rigging in U. of Texas arena project
item.description: Tim Lewieke is the former CEO of Maple Leaf Sports and Entertainment. Before that, he served as CEO of Anschutz Entertainment Group.

item.title: Trump threatened to 'bomb the s--- out' of Moscow to deter Putin: CNN
item.description: Since President Donald Trump returned to the White House, he has sharpened his rhetoric criticizing Russian President Vladimir Putin.

item.title: Trump sends more letters dictating high tariff rates around the world
item.description: Trump uses tariffs as a key tool to force changes to U.S. trade relationships, but his on-again, off-again approach has roiled markets and stoked unce...

item.title: Trump's tariffs on cars, copper, drugs, aluminum could hit harder than other levies
item.description: The sector-specific tariffs are putting pressure on businesses and foreign nations as they try to navigate Trump's constantly evolving trade agenda.

item.title: Embattled Iran slams consequences of war on oil markets
item.description: War can lead to ‘complications on energy producers’ and hardships on national economies, Iran’s oil minister warned on Wednesday.
